Title: Relates to increasing the maximum amount of grants and loans under the airport improvement and revitalization grant and loan program
Summary: Increases the maximum amount of grants and loans under the airport improvement and revitalization grant and loan program from 1.5 million to 2.5 million dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to increasing the maximum amount of grants and loans under the airport improvement and revitalization grant and loan program
